channel.title: Making a batch file [tut] compiling .java
channel.description:
:eek: :eek: [shadow=red,left][u][b][size=30pt] Compiling Tut
[/size][/b][/u][/shadow] Open up a blank [u]notepad[/u] document and type the following: [b]Step 1[/b] - [code]@echo off[/code] This means that it dosent show you aa whole loada crap that u dont need to see (if u miss this step then u get a lot a crap that u dont need to see)
[b]Step 2[/b] - in a new line type the following code: [code]javac *.java[/code] This tells means that whatever folder you put the .bat you are making in, it will compile all the .java files. So if you replace "*.java" with "c:/gayporn.java" then it will compile your gayporn .java files into .class files.
[b]Step 3[/b] - then simply type: [code]pause[/code] This just means that at the end it says "press any key to continue..." It is very important that tis is in the code for some reason though, dont ask me why...
Your notepad document should now look like the following: [code] @echo off javac *.java pause
Step 4: [/code] also if you want to customise it then put in underneath "@echo off" [code] title Compiling... echo ************************************** echo * Compiling GayPorn * echo * Collection * echo ************************************** color 4 [/code]
Step 5: Saving The document is the most important part because if u do it wrong it fuks up LOL Go to "file>save as"(obvi), then copy the pic [img]http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/7684/tut6rw.png[/img] Then Click Save and your done!!
[/end] A few people have asked for help with compiling java on sythe n other syts so i made a little shyte tut
If there is anything i missed out plzz post and i will edit and give you a small recognition at teh bottom =P
MartiN

item.title: Making a batch file [tut] compiling .java
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

:eek: :eek:
[shadow=red,left][u][b][size=30pt]
Compiling Tut

[/size][/b][/u][/shadow]
Open up a blank notepad document and type the following:
Step 1 - 

@echo off

This means that it dosent show you aa whole loada crap that u dont need to see
(if u miss this step then u get a lot a crap that u dont need to see)

Step 2 - in a new line type the following code:

javac *.java


This tells means that whatever folder you put the .bat you are making in, it will compile all the .java files.
So if you replace "*.java" with "c:/gayporn.java" then it will compile your gayporn .java files into .class files.

Step 3 - then simply type:

pause

This just means that at the end it says "press any key to continue..."
It is very important that tis is in the code for some reason though, dont ask me why...

Your notepad document should now look like the following:

@echo off
javac *.java
pause
Step 4:

also if you want to customise it then put in underneath
"@echo off"

title Compiling...
echo **************************************
echo *                   Compiling GayPorn                      *
echo *                          Collection                          *
echo **************************************
color 4

Step 5: Saving The document is the most important part because if u do it wrong it fuks up LOL
Go to "file>save as"(obvi), then copy the pic

Then Click Save and your done!!

[/end]
A few people have asked for help with compiling java on sythe n other syts so i made a little shyte tut

If there is anything i missed out plzz post and i will edit and give you a small recognition at teh bottom =P

MartiN

Read full topic
